response.overview: The Legend Of Devi Durga is a wonderful devotional animated movie in Hindi. The movie is dedicated to Goddess Durga and celebrates her victory over the mighty demon Mahishasur. Mahishasur the buffalo headed demon named gets a boon which makes him invincible. He chooses to be an unbearable tyrant. When his tyranny crosses all bounds, the anger of all the mighty Gods leads to the formation of the warrior Goddess Durga. How will Durga defeat this demon? The movie is also about Lord Rama's campaign in Lanka.
response.title: The Legend of Devi Durga
